entry.title: 小闹钟
entry.content: 你从来没有玩过的船新版本上一个太丑了(目前只支持倒计时）（太弱了）下面是程序1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465#include<cstdlib>#include<windows.h>#include<iostream>using namespace std;int main(){ int hour,second,minute; cout<<"输入格式\"时 分 秒\""<<endl; cin>>hour>>minute>>second; if(minute==60&&second>0) { cout<<"Input error!"<<endl; } else { if(minute>60||second>60) cout<<"Input error!"<<endl; else { for(int i=3600*hour+60*minute+second;i>0;Sleep(1000),i--) { system("cls"); if((minute)<0) { hour-=1; minute=60; } if((second-1)<0) { minute-=1; second=60; } if(second<10&&minute<10) { second--; cout<<hour<<":0"<<minute<<":0"<<second<<endl; } if(second<10&&minute>=10) { second--; cout<<hour<<":"<<minute<<":0"<<second<<endl; } if(second>=10&&minute<10) { second--; cout<<hour<<":0"<<minute<<":"<<second<<endl; } if(second>=10&&minute>=10) { second--; cout<<hour<<":"<<minute<<":"<<second<<endl; } } for(int i=10;i>0;i--) { cout<<"\a"<<endl; Sleep(1000); } } } return 0;}
